title: Andrew Vincent
text:
Andrew Vincent is a New Zealand former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played for the <a href="North%20Sydney%20Bears">North Sydney Bears</a>.
Playing career.
A junior in the <a href="Canterbury%20Rugby%20League">Canterbury Rugby League</a> competition, Vincent played for the <a href="Junior%20Kiwis">Junior Kiwis</a> in 1985 and 1986. He was selected for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20M%C4%81ori%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand Māori</a> squad at the <a href="1986%20Pacific%20Cup">1986 Pacific Cup</a>, but had to pull out due to injury. He spent the <a href="1988%20NSWRL%20season">1988 NSWRL season</a> in Sydney with the <a href="North%20Sydney%20Bears">North Sydney Bears</a>, playing in one first grade match.
He then returned to New Zealand and became a regular in the <a href="Canterbury%20rugby%20league%20team">Canterbury side</a>. In 1994, with the launch of the <a href="Lion%20Red%20Cup">Lion Red Cup</a>, Vincent joined the <a href="Christchurch%20City%20Shiners">Christchurch City Shiners</a>.
